Company

Trip Boards are starting to be an item of high demand among the youngsters in India.

LinkLine e-Commerce Pvt Ltd is an established brand in the bike & hoverboard booking business with a presence across South India.

Winner of top awards and achievements from both Royal Enfield and KTM, we have been instrumented in providing hundreds of bookings to these brands in a short period of time

We are now exited to launch Trip Boards, and we aim to be the single largest vendor of hoverboards in India.

Fast Shipment

No longer waiting for your product. We provide fast delivery service with in given period of time.

Damage Protection

Six months damage free warranty.

Eco Friendly

No noise, no air pollution. Just charge once and use limitless. Save petroleum as well.
